mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_pwd_reset_token (token, member_no, expired_dt, create_dt, create_by) VALUES (#{token}, #{memberNo}, #{expiredDt}, current_timestamp, #{creator})
mapper.select: SELECT m.email FROM tb_pwd_reset_token t LEFT JOIN tb_member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no WHERE token = #{token};
